name: FormData_GetFormData
description:
This method downloads the envelope and tab data (also called form data) from any in-process, completed, or canceled envelope that you sent or that is shared with you. Recipients who are also full administrators on an account can view form data for any envelopes that another user on the account has sent to them.

**Note:** To use this feature, the Sending Setting "Allow sender to download form data" must be enabled for the account.

### Related topics

- [How to get envelope tab values](/docs/esign-rest-api/how-to/get-envelope-tab-values/)

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$block: Describes the form data of the envelope.

$ul: **emailSubject**: The subject line of the email message that is sent to all recipients.
**envelopeId**: The envelope ID of the envelope status that failed to post.
**recipientFormData**: An array of form data for each recipient of the envelope.
**sentDateTime**: The UTC DateTime when the envelope was sent. This property is read-only.
**status**: Indicates the envelope status. Valid values are:

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
